|brand = SMC |model = SMCD3GN |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = V (Comcast) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 10/27/2011â€Ž |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/SMC SMCD3GNV (Comcast) |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, cable modem, analog phone gateway |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = RRK-WMPN13A1 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 8WMPN13.2A1G |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Texas Instruments;TNETC4800; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARMv6 |cpu1_type_rev = ARMv6TEJ |cpu1spd = 400 <!-- 400 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Atheros;AR8316; |cm_down_c = 4 |cm_up_c = 4 |docsisver = 3.0 |voip_ports = |wan_ports = <!-- 1 --> |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:26:F3, 78:CD:8E |oui = 00:26:F3, 78:CD:8E
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Mini PCIe |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-120 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.5 |pwr_conn = C7P
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = DOCSIS 3.0 |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 10.0.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = HOME-XXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^HOME-[A-F0-9]{4}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Hitron |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/07/2010 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Alpha Networks WMP-N13 |rad1modif = Mini PCIe (oversized) |rad1chip1 = Ralink;RT3662; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== [http://media2.comcast.net/anon.comcastonline2/support/userguides/Wireless_Gateway_User_Guide_030811.pdf User manual for Comcast]
[http://web.archive.org/web/20101207035322/http://www.smc.com/files/AX/SMCD3GNVFeatureSheet.pdf Feature sheet for the device (via archive.org)]
This device is using TNETC4800 (TNETC4800ZDWGU) - a '''Puma 5''' SoC.
The default SSID is '''HOME-XXXX''' where '''XXXX''' is the last two octets :of the wireless interface MAC address.
[http://certifications.wi-fi.org/pdf_certificate.php?cid=WFA8898 WiFi Certified]
"8WMPN13..2A1G" is silkscreened on the wireless module in the FCC photos.
"P/N: 3833080408N0 REV 12.1" appears to be silkscreened on the board. <!-- per C. Dodgeson --> :'''Hitron''' / '''HitronTechnologies''' is the presumed manufacturer.
This is a 4x4 cable modem.
===Likely compatible services=== *{{Approved by service|Comcast}} ([http://mydeviceinfo.g.comcast.net/device.php?devid=332 '''Comcast''' device database entry])
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.speedguide.net/routers/smc-smcd3gnv-docsis30-multimedia-voice-gateway-933 On '''SpeedGuide.net'''] *[https://10-0-0-0-1.org/comcast-router-login/ On '''Comcast Router Login Steps with Admin Username & Password'''] *[https://10-0-0-0-1-ip.com/ On '''Comcast Router Login'''] *[https://www.changewifipassword.com/change-my-comcast-wifi-password/ On '''How Do I Change My Comcast Wifi Password'''] *[https://www.10-0-0-0-1.tech/ On '''Comcast Router Login Steps with Admin Username & Password''']
